"Which are the formulae to be recited twice?

ab.em: ahiiā ẏāsā (Y28.3)... humatanąm ... (Y35.2) aṣ̌ahiiā āat̰ (Y35.8) ... ẏaθā tū ī (Y39.4) ... humāīm θβā īžīm (Y41.3) ... θβōi staotarascā (Y41.5) ... uštā ahmāi (Y43.2)... spəṇtā mainiiū (Y47.2) ... vohū xšaθrəm vairīm (Y51.2) ... vahištā īštiš (Y53.2)

Ritual.ab: Cf. N5.3 (about the way to recite Y28.3, see Cantera, 2016: p. 61) (cf. Kotwal and Kreyenbroek, 1995: pp. 48-49)
dōspurrnām paymānag ahiiā ẏāsā nəmaŋhā ustāna.zastōka [ēk] ahiiā ẏāsā ud ēk nəmaŋhā dārēd ān xūbtar ka pad hakat̰ gōwēnd ka 2 ēk-ē pēš ān xūbtar ka zōt pēš ka rāspīg pēš ēd-iz šāyēd

The measure for dōspurrnām concerning ahiiā ẏāsā nəmaŋhā ustāna.zastō is when one recites hiiā ẏāsā and the other nəmaŋhā.... (However, it is better, when both recite it in unison. If one of the two is ahead, it is better if the zōt is ahead; if the rāspīg is ahead, it is also allowed."
